insert into message(message_no, message_receive_id, message_send_id, message_title, message_content, message_date, message_receive_date, message_receive_check, member_no)values (#{messageNo}, #{messageReceiveId}, #{messageSendId}, #{messageTitle}, #{messageContent}, sysdate, #{messageReceiveDate, jdbcType=DATE}, 0, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update message set message_receive_date=sysdate, message_receive_check=1 where member_no=#{memberNo} and message_no=#{messageNo}
mapper.delete: delete from message where member_no=#{memberNo} and message_no=#{messageNo}
mapper.select: select t2.* from(select rownum rnum, t1.* from (select message_no, message_receive_id, message_send_id, message_title, message_content, message_date, message_receive_date, message_receive_check, member_no from message where member_no=${memberNo} order by message_no desc)t1)t2 where rnum between ${startRow} and ${lastRow}
select * from message where member_no=#{memberNo} and message_no=#{messageNo}
